body.p:
You can use the Use Active Voice action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Rewrite category to ask the AI Positron to change a DITA topic's selected content from passive to active voice.

The Use Active Voice AI action is incredibly useful for end users as it helps them improve their writing style and communication skills. By suggesting and encouraging the use of active voice, this action ensures that the user's sentences are clear, concise, and engaging. Active voice not only makes the writing more direct and impactful but also facilitates better understanding of the subject and the action being performed. This AI action assists users in creating more compelling content, be it in academic papers, professional emails, creative writing, or any other form of written communication. With the Use Active Voice AI action, users can enhance their overall writing proficiency and effectively convey their message to the intended audience.
Open the topic, select paragraphs inside it and invoke the Use Active Voice action.
